name: Sporo's Island
description:
Say hello to Sporo: a tiny "fun guy" who lives in Sporo's island with a large hot nickel ball. 

Using Unity and Blender, I created Sporo's island for a school project, with the intention of making a simple, relaxing world. I used Blender and Unity to create 3D models, character rigs, particle effects, and postprocessing. I hope you enjoy!
